		try {
			(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
			new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],

			'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
			})(window,document,'script','dataLayer', 'GTM-PC72WTH');
		} catch(e) {
			console.log("Ocurrio un error en Google Tag Manager");
			console.log(e);
		}
	}

	var absoluteURL = "https://www.coppel.com/";
	var absoluteURLSercurity = absoluteURL;
	var subAbsoluteURL = absoluteURL.split(':');
	if(subAbsoluteURL[0] == 'https'){
		absoluteURLSercurity = 'http:'+ subAbsoluteURL[1];
	}
	console.debug("URLs->"+absoluteURL);
	console.debug("URL->"+absoluteURLSercurity);
	
	var imageDirectoryPath = "https://cdn2.coppel.com/wcsstore/AuroraStorefrontAssetStore/";
	var styleDirectoryPath = "images/colors/color1/";
	var supportPaymentTypePromotions = false;
	
	var subsFulfillmentFrequencyAttrName = "fulfillmentFrequency";
	var subsPaymentFrequencyAttrName = "paymentFrequency";
	var subsTimePeriodAttrName = "timePeriod";
	
	var storeNLS = null;
	var storeUserType = "G";
	var ios = false;
	var android = true;
	var multiSessionEnabled = false;
	
	// Store the amount of time of inactivity before a re-login is required, this value is retrieved from wc-server.xml, default is 30 mins
	var inactivityTimeout = 604800000;
	
	// Store the amount of time the inactivity warning dialog will be displayed before it closes itself, default is 20 seconds
	var inactivityWarningDialogDisplayTimer = 20000;
	
	// Store the amount of time to display a inactivity warning dialog before a re-login is required, default is 30 seconds
	var inactivityWarningDialogBuffer = 30000;
	
	// Store the timing event to display the inactivity dialog
	var inactivityTimeoutTracker = null;

	// Store the timing event to close the inactivity dialog
	var dialogTimeoutTracker = null;
	
	//Summary: Returns the absolute URL to use for prefixing any Ajax URL call.
	//Description: Dojo does not handle the case where the parameters in the URL are delimeted by the "/" forward slash. Therefore, in order to
	//             workaround the issue, all AJAX requests must be done using absolute URLs rather than relative.
	//Returns: The absolute URL to use for prefixing any Ajax URL call.
	function getAbsoluteURL() {
		if (absoluteURL != "") {
			var currentURL = document.URL;
			var currentProtocol = "";
		
			if (currentURL.indexOf("://") != -1) {
				currentProtocol = currentURL.substring(0, currentURL.indexOf("://"));
			}
			
			var savedProtocol = "";
			if (absoluteURL.indexOf("://") != -1) {
				savedProtocol = absoluteURL.substring(0, absoluteURL.indexOf("://"));
			}
			
			if (currentProtocol != savedProtocol) {
				absoluteURL = currentProtocol + absoluteURL.substring(absoluteURL.indexOf("://"));
			}
		}
		
		return absoluteURL;
	}
	//Summary: Returns the path pointing to the shared image directory.
	//Description: In order to get the image directory path in any javascript file, this function can be used.
	//Returns: The path to reference images.
	function getImageDirectoryPath() {
		return imageDirectoryPath;
	}
	//Summary: Returns the path pointing to the directory containing color-dependant image files.
	//Description: In order to get the directory containing color-dependant image files in any javascript file, this function can be used.
	//Returns: The path to reference color-dependant image files.
	function getStyleDirectoryPath() {
		return styleDirectoryPath;
	}
	
	//Adding new functions for disabled menu
	function disableDoubleClickMenu(menu,level,textContent)  {
		console.log("coppelClientCoppel disableDoubleClickMenu");
		categoryLevelClicked(menu,level,textContent);
	    if (typeof(_linkEnabled)=="undefined") _linkEnabled = true;
	    setTimeout("blockClick()", 100);
	    return _linkEnabled;
	}
	
	function disableDoubleClickDeparment(menu,level,textContent) {
		console.log("coppelClientCoppel disableDoubleClickDeparment");
		categoryLevelClicked(menu,level,textContent);
		if (typeof(_linkEnabled)=="undefined") _linkEnabled = true;
	    setTimeout("blockClick()", 100);
	    return _linkEnabled;
	}
	
	function blockClick() {
		_linkEnabled = false;
		setTimeout("_linkEnabled=true", 1000);
	}
</script>

	 name = name.replace(/[\[]/, "\\[").replace(/[\]]/, "\\]");
	 var regex = new RegExp("[\\?&]" + name + "=([^&#]*)"),
	 results = regex.exec(location.search);
	 return results === null ? "" : decodeURIComponent(results[1].replace(/\+/g, " "));
 }

<script>
require(["dojo/on", "dojo/domReady!"], function(on) {
    on(document, "keyup", function(event) {
		if(event.which == 27)
		{
		if(document.getElementById('MessageArea')){
			if(document.getElementById('MessageArea').style.display != 'block')	{
				document.getElementById('background_shadow').style.display = 'none';
			}
		}
		else{
			document.getElementById('background_shadow').style.display = 'none';
		}
		}
	 });
});

</script>

				<div class="button_footer_line" id="btnNoMsj" style="display:none">								
					<a role="button" tabindex="0" href="JavaScript:MessageHelper.hideMessageArea();" class="btn btn-cancelar tlignore">
						No
					</a>
				</div>	
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">

	try {
		(function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
		  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
		  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
		  })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

<script type="text/javascript">        
    ga('require', 'ec');
	var optionsToSend = '';
	var isValidationRequired = 'no';
    dojo.addOnLoad( function() {
				
		dojo.query('#WC_AccountDisplay_links_3 > div').onclick( function(event) {
        	ga('send', 'event', "Crea una cuenta", 'click', 'iniciar');
        });

		dojo.query('#page > div.wrapper-narrow.static_content > div > section > aside > a').onclick( function(event) {
            ga('send', 'event', "Recarga tiempo aire aquí", 'click');
        });

		dojo.query('#contentRecommendationWidget_4_-1012_6801 > div > a').onclick( function(event) {
            sendGas("", getMenuTitles(), this.title,'click')
        });


        dojo.query('#contentRecommendationWidget_2_-1000_3802 > div > ul > li > a').onclick( function(event) {
            var title = document.getElementById('title_2_-1000_3802').textContent.trim();
            ga('send', 'event', title, 'click', this.textContent.trim());
        });

	// this function is for CatalogEntryRecommendation_Horizontal_UI.jspf clicks
	function recommendationsClicked(widget, id, widgetId){

		var title = "";
		var click = "click";
		var categ = false;
		var menuTitle = '';

		if (widget == "catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_2_-1002_3303") {
		    title = "Nuevos artículos";
		} else if (widget == "catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_6_-1002_1307") { //CAMBIA
		    title = "Recomendaciones";
		} else if (widget == "catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_6_-1002_25601") { //CAMBIA
		    title = "Lo más vendido";
		} else if (widgetId == '_4_-1012_1313') {
			menuTitle = getMenuTitles();
			title =  menuTitle + '-Brands Slider';
			click = 'Brands Slider';
			categ = true;
		} else if (widgetId == '_7_-1012_3305') {
			menuTitle = getMenuTitles();
			title = 'Conoce más de '+ menuTitle;
			click = title;
			categ = true;
		} else if (widgetId == '_6_-1012_3304') {
			menuTitle = getMenuTitles();
			title = menuTitle + ' Companies';
			click = title;
			categ = true;
		} else {
		    title = document.getElementById('title'+widgetId).textContent.trim();
		}

		var recommendationlIsclicked = ""; 

		if (widgetId == '_3_-1000_1301') {
			recommendationlIsclicked = document.getElementById(widget).getElementsByTagName('h3')[id].textContent.trim();
			title = 'Más servicios, más beneficios';
		} else {
			//recommendationlIsclicked = document.getElementById(widget).getElementsByTagName('img')[id].getAttribute('alt');
			recommendationlIsclicked = dojo.query('#'+widget).query('.swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-duplicate)').query('img')[id].getAttribute('alt'); //CAMBIA
		}

		if (categ) {
			sendGasCategory(id, title, recommendationlIsclicked,click,menuTitle);
		} else {
			sendGas(id, title, recommendationlIsclicked,click);
		}
	}

	function getMenuTitles(){
		if (document.getElementById('widget_breadcrumb')!=null){
			var title = document.getElementById('lastBreadCrumbItem').value;
			return title;
		}
	}

	function getBreadcrumTitles(){
		if (document.getElementById('widget_breadcrumb')!=null){
			var title = document.getElementById('breadCrumbItem').value;
			return title;
		}
	}

	function sendGas(id, name, alt, click){}

	function sendGasCategory(id, name, alt, click,maintitle){}

	function getTitle(widgetId){
		var title = document.getElementById(widgetId).textContent.trim();
		return title;
	}

	function NewAccountClicked() {
		ga('send', 'event', 'Nueva cuenta', 'Click', 'Crear una nueva cuenta');
	}

	function carouselClicked(id, name) {
	   	var slider_cat = dojo.query('#contentCarousel_1_1003_1302').query('.swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-duplicate) ').query('.btn:first-of-type')[id-1].dataset.categoria; // CAMBIA 

	    ga('ec:addPromo',{
		  'id': 'SliderH_'+id, //CAMBIA
		  'name': "HomePage-Carosuel",
		  'creative': 'Slider_'+id.toString()+'-'+slider_cat, //CAMBIA
		  'position': id
		});
	    ga('ec:setAction', 'promo_click');
	    ga('send', 'event', 'HomePage-Carousel', 'click', 'Slider_'+id.toString()+'-'+slider_cat); //CAMBIA
	}
		
	function onClickEvent(thisObj,eventObj,serviceName){

		var targetURL = null;
		var dataSlotId = null;
		var alt = null;
		var pageName = 'DefaultCategoryPageLayout';
		
		if(eventObj.target.getAttribute("alt") != 'undefined'
			&& eventObj.target.getAttribute("alt") != 'null'
			&& eventObj.target.getAttribute("alt") != ''
			&& eventObj.target.getAttribute("alt") != null){
			
			targetURL = dojo.query(eventObj.target).parent("a");
			dataSlotId = dojo.query(thisObj).parent().attr("data-slot-id");
			alt = eventObj.target.getAttribute("alt");

		} else {
			targetURL = dojo.query(eventObj.target)[0].attr('href');
			dataSlotId = dojo.query(thisObj).parent().attr("data-slot-id");
			alt = dojo.query(eventObj.target)[0].textContent;
		}
		ga('send', 'event', pageName, serviceName, alt); // Home Page
	}
	
	function sendLogedInInformationOnCheckout(){
		var map = { 'step': '1', 'options': 'Logged In' };
		ga('ec:setAction', 'checkout', map);
		ga('send', 'event', 'Checkout Steps', 'Login');
    }
      
	function categoryLevelClicked(menu,level,textContent){
		ga('send', 'event', menu, level, textContent);
	}
    
	function searchFacetCategoryClicked(widgetSuffix,text){
		var name = 'Left Menu';
		if (widgetSuffix=='_5_-1009_1105'){
			name = getBreadcrumTitles();
		}
		ga('send', 'event', name, getMenuTitles(), text.trim());
	}
      
	function sectionlistmfNameClicked(text){
		ga('send', 'event', getBreadcrumTitles(), getMenuTitles(), text.trim());
	} 
     
    function paymentoptions(){
     	var optionsToSend = document.getElementById("selectedMethod_1").value;
     	var paymentMethod = '';
     	if (optionsToSend == 'PayU'){
     	    paymentMethod = document.getElementById("establishmentId_1").value;
     	    optionsToSend = 'Efectivo';
     	} else if (optionsToSend == 'CreditoCoppel'){
	     	if (document.getElementById("establishmentId_2")!='undefined' && document.getElementById("establishmentId_2")!=null){
	     		paymentMethod = document.getElementById("establishmentId_2").value;
	     	} else {
	     	 	paymentMethod = 'Tarjeta de crédito/débito';
	     	}
     		optionsToSend = 'Credito Coppel';
     	} else if (optionsToSend == 'Master Card'){
     		optionsToSend = 'Tarjeta de crédito/débito';
     	}
     	
     	if (optionsToSend != 'Tarjeta de crédito/débito'){
	     	if (paymentMethod == 'banamex'){
	     		optionsToSend = optionsToSend +' - '+'Bancomer/HSBC/Banamex';
	     	} else if (paymentMethod == 'scotia'){
	     		optionsToSend = optionsToSend +' - '+'SCOTIABANK';
	     	} else if (paymentMethod == 'Tarjeta de crédito/débito'){
	     		optionsToSend = optionsToSend +' - '+'Tarjeta de crédito/débito';
	     	} else{
	     		optionsToSend = optionsToSend +' - '+paymentMethod.toUpperCase();
	     	}
     	}
     	
     	return optionsToSend;
	}
	 
	function contentRecomClicked(widgetId,banerType,id){}
</script>

<!-- START AnalyticsCart.jspf -->
<script type="text/javascript">
        // Called when a product is added/removed from a shopping cart.
        dojo.addOnLoad( function() {
          // attach on click to id="textDiv"
          dojo.query('#add2CartBtn').onclick( function(evt) {
            var el = this;
                if (dojo.byId("entitledItem_")!=null) {
                        //the json object for entitled items are already in the HTML.
                         entitledItemJSON = eval('('+ dojo.byId("entitledItem_").innerHTML +')');
                }
                productDisplayJS.setEntitledItems(entitledItemJSON);
                var catalogEntryId = productDisplayJS.getCatalogEntryId("entitledItem_");

            var price = 0;
            if(document.getElementById("ProductInfoPrice_"+catalogEntryId) != null
                && document.getElementById("ProductInfoPrice_"+catalogEntryId) != ''){
                price = document.getElementById("ProductInfoPrice_"+catalogEntryId).value;
            } else {
                price = document.getElementById("ProductInfoPrice_").value;
            }
            var qty = document.getElementById("quantity_").value;
            var productName = document.getElementById("ProductInfoName_").value;
                addRemoveCart('03-1616', productName, '13151', price, qty, 'add');

          });
        });

        // Called when a product is added/removed from a shopping cart.
        function updateItemEvent(skuId, name, categoryId, price, originalQuantity, updatedQuantity) {

                //if(event.keyCode == dojo.keys.TAB) return;
                var qty = originalQuantity - updatedQuantity.value;

                if(qty < 0){
                        qty = updatedQuantity.value - originalQuantity;
                        addRemoveCart(skuId, name, categoryId, price, qty, 'update');
                } else if(qty > 0){
                        addRemoveCart(skuId, name, categoryId, price, qty, 'remove');
                }
        }

        function addRemoveCart(skuId, name, categoryId, price, qty, actionType) {

                ga('ec:addProduct',{                    // productFieldObject stores product click and other details
                        'id': skuId,                            // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
                        'name': name,                           // Product name - Type: string
                        'category': categoryId,         // Product category - Type: string
                        'price': price,                         // Product price - Type: numeric
                        'quantity': qty,                        // Product quantity - Type: numeric
                });

                ga('ec:setAction', actionType); // send 'add' or 'remove' //Server Variable here is either "add" or "remove"
                //  ga('newTracker.send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', '[Server Variable]');     // Send 'add to cart' or 'remove from cart' using an event.
                ga('send', 'event', 'Shopping Cart', actionType, name); // Product Page

        }

</script>

<!-- END AnalyticsCart.jspf --><!-- START AnalyticsCheckout.jspf -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	
	function sendChekoutPageEvent(gaCheckoutStep, options){
		// Add the step number and additional info about the checkout to the action.
		//ga('ec:setAction','checkout', {'step': gaCheckoutStep, 'option': ''});
		var map = '';
		if (options != 'noOptions') {
			map = {'step': gaCheckoutStep, 'option': options}; //gaCheckoutStep is always numeric; Options Can be text information
		} else {
			map = {'step': gaCheckoutStep, 'option': ''}; //gaCheckoutStep is always numeric; Options Can be text information
		}
		
		sendActionInformation(gaCheckoutStep, map);
	}
 			 
	function sendPaymentMethodEvent(gaCheckoutStep, payMethod){
		// Add the step number and additional info about the checkout to the action.
		
		var bankName = null;
		var elements = document.getElementsByName("establishmentId");
		for (var i = 0, l = elements.length; i < l; i++){
	        if (elements[i].checked)
	        {
	        	if(dojo.query(".bank_payment").parents("#paymentSection1") != null
	        		&& dojo.query(".bank_payment").parents("#paymentSection1") != ''
	        		&& dojo.query(".bank_payment").parents("#paymentSection1") != 'undefined'){
		        	bankName = elements[i].value;
		        }else if(dojo.query(".bank_payment").parents("#paymentSection2").attr("style").indexOf("none") == -1){
		            bankName = elements[i].value;
		        }
	        }
	        break;
	    }
	    if(bankName != null){
			//ga('ec:setAction', 'checkout_option', {'step': gaCheckoutStep, 'payment-method': payMethod, 'bankName': bankName});
			var map = {'step': gaCheckoutStep, 'options': bankName};
			sendActionInformation(gaCheckoutStep, map);
			ga('send', 'event', "Checkout Steps", "Payment Options", bankName);
		}
		else{
			//ga('ec:setAction', 'checkout_option', {'step': gaCheckoutStep, 'payment-method': payMethod});
			var map = {'step': gaCheckoutStep, 'options': payMethod};
			sendActionInformation(gaCheckoutStep, map);
			ga('send', 'event', "Checkout Steps", "Payment Options", payMethod);
		}
	}
	
	function sendOrderConfirmationEvent(orderId,total,tax,shippingCharges,coupon,store){
		
		var map = {	'id': orderId, 					// Transaction id - Type: string
			'affiliation': store, 				// Store name - Type: string
			'revenue': total, 				// Total Revenue - Type: numeric
			'tax': tax, 					// Tax - Type: numeric
			'shipping': shippingCharges, 	// Shipping - Type: numeric
			'coupon': coupon 				// Order/Transaction coupon - Type: string
		};
		sendActionInformation('purchase', map);
	}
	
	function sendActionInformation(actionName, paramMap){
		var checkoutStepName = '';
		
		if (actionName == '2') {
			checkoutStepName = 'Shopping Cart';
			ga('ec:setAction', 'checkout', paramMap); 
		} else if (actionName == '3') {
			checkoutStepName = 'Shipping & Billing';
			ga('ec:setAction', 'checkout', paramMap); 
		} else if (actionName == '4') {
			checkoutStepName = 'Order Summary';
			ga('ec:setAction', 'checkout', paramMap); 
		} else if (actionName == '5') {
			checkoutStepName = 'Order Confirmation';
			ga('ec:setAction', 'checkout', paramMap); 
		}else {
			checkoutStepName = 'Order Confirmation';
			ga('ec:setAction', actionName, paramMap); 
		}
		ga('send', 'event', 'Checkout Steps', checkoutStepName);
	}
      
       function sendGuestInformationOnCheckout(){
           var map = { 'step': '1', 'options': 'Guest' };
           ga('ec:setAction', 'checkout', map);
           ga('send', 'event', 'Checkout Steps', 'Guest');
        }
      

		
	function sendEventInformation(checkoutPageName, eventAction){
		
		ga('send', 'event', checkoutPageName, eventAction);
	}

	
</script>

<!-- END AnalyticsCheckout.jspf --><!-- END AnalyticsCommon.jspf --><!-- END CommonJSPFToInclude.jspf -->

<script>
dojo.addOnLoad(function() {
	if (getCookie("abonoToken") == null) { 
		document.getElementById("abonoCredito").setAttribute("style", "display: none;")
		document.getElementById("abonoCreditoMobile").setAttribute("style", "display: none;")
	}
	else {
		if (getCookie("abonoToken").length == 0){
			document.getElementById("abonoCredito").setAttribute("style", "display: none;")
			document.getElementById("abonoCreditoMobile").setAttribute("style", "display: none;")
		} else {
			document.getElementById("abonoContado").setAttribute("style", "display: none;")
			document.getElementById("abonoContadoMobile").setAttribute("style", "display: none;")
		} 	
	}
});
</script>

<script>

	var isCatalogCoppel = "false";
	

	if (isCatalogCoppel == "true") {
		
		// Google Analytics
		tagManagerEsCatalogo();
		
		// Data Layer de Tag Manager
		window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
		
		dataLayer.push({
			'event': 'authentication',
			't_ip': '',
			't_num_tienda': '',
			't_ciudad': 'DISTRITO FEDERAL',
			't_estado': 'IZTAPALAPA',
			't_formato': ''
		});
		
		// Remover el atributo click cuando es catalogo
		$('.elegirTiendaDesktop button').removeAttr('onClick');
		$('.elegirTiendaDesktop button .fa.fa-chevron-down').hide();

		// Generar cookie con datos cuando sea catalogo
		var myCookie = getCookie("CATALOG_COPPEL");
		
	    if (myCookie == null) {
	        var d = new Date();
		    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
		    var expires = "expires="+d.toUTCString(),
		    	ip = "",
		    	stateId = "25",
		   		cityName = "DISTRITO FEDERAL",
		    	stateName = "IZTAPALAPA",
		    	cityId = "84",
		    	numTienda = "",
		    	storeType = "";
		    
			document.cookie = "CATALOG_COPPEL="+ip.trim()+"-"+stateId.trim()+"-"+cityName.trim()+"-"+stateName.trim()+"-"+cityId.trim()+"-"+numTienda.trim()+"-"+storeType.trim()+";" + expires + ";path=/";    
		}
	
	} else {
		
			tagManagerNoEsCatalogo();
		
	}
	
	// metodo que busca si existe o no una cookie
	function getCookie(name) {
	    var dc = document.cookie;
	    var prefix = name + "=";
	    var begin = dc.indexOf("; " + prefix);
	    if (begin == -1) {
	        begin = dc.indexOf(prefix);
	        if (begin != 0) return null;
	    } else {
	        begin += 2;
	        var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", begin);
	        if (end == -1) {
	        	end = dc.length;
	        }
	    }

	    return decodeURI(dc.substring(begin + prefix.length, end));
	}

</script>
	 


<a class="ciudadEntregaChange " onclick="showCambiarTienda2()" style="pointer-events: default; cursor: default;">
	<span class="location" id="location"><span><i class="fa fa-map-marker"></i> Ciudad de entrega:  </span>  <span class="locationCityName">DISTRITO FEDERAL, IZTAPALAPA</span></span> 
	
	<i class="fa fa-chevron-up"></i>
	
</a>

<script type="text/javascript">
	var cityAndStateNameVar = 'DISTRITO FEDERAL, IZTAPALAPA';
	var cityAndStateNameVarNew = "";
	for (var x =0; x<cityAndStateNameVar.length; x++) {
		var characterSpecial = cityAndStateNameVar[x];
		if(characterSpecial.charCodeAt(0) == 195) {
			cityAndStateNameVarNew += String.fromCharCode(209);
			x++;
		} else {
			cityAndStateNameVarNew += cityAndStateNameVar[x];
		}
	}
	document.getElementById("location").innerHTML = '<span><i class="fa fa-map-marker"></i> Ciudad de entrega:  </span>  <span class="locationCityName">' +cityAndStateNameVarNew + '</span>';
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	var cityAndStateName = cityAndStateNameVarNew;
	var cityName = cityAndStateName.split(",")[0].trim();
	var stateName = cityAndStateName.split(",")[1].trim();
	ga('set', 'dimension2', stateName); // State
	ga('set', 'dimension3', cityName); // City
	//ga('send', 'event', 'State And City', stateName, cityName);
</script>
<!-- END GEOLOC.jsp-->

			  <div> <!-- Menu departamentos -->

    &lt;/div&gt;

<script>
	/* Función para abrir modales con mensajes de alerta */
	function openModal(title, data){
		$('#modalAlert .modal-header .modal-title').html(title);
		
		$('#modalAlert .modal-body').html(data);
		$('#modalAlert').modal('show');
	}
		
	function ocultarBuscador(){
		$('.buscadorMobile').removeClass('clicked');
	}

	$(document).ready(function(){

		/* Funcionalidad Elegir tienda en Desktop */
		var tiendaActual = $('#location .locationCityName').text();
		$('.elegirTiendaDesktop .ciudadTienda').text(tiendaActual);
		$('.elegirTiendaDesktop .cd-entrega-spinner').addClass('hidden');

		/* Funcionalidad búscador en mobile */
		$('.buscadorMobile #SimpleSearchForm_SearchTerm').on('focus', function(){
			$('.buscadorMobile').addClass('clicked');
		});
		/* / Funcionalidad búscador en mobile */
		$('#departmentsMenu li').on('mouseover', function(){ iniciarLazyLoad(); });
	
		setTimeout(function(){ $('.zopim iframe').attr('title', 'Área para solicitar ayuda'); }, 7000);
	
	  	$('.product .product_info').each(function(){
			var arr = $('input[type="hidden"][id^="ProductInfoPrice"]', this);
			arr.slice(1,4).remove();
		});
		
		$(function(){
			/* Inicializar tooltips de bootstrap */
			$('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
		});
	
		$(".departmentMenuBlock[role='menu'],#header #departmentsMenu > li").mouseleave(function(){
			$(".departmentButton").attr("style","")
		 });
		 
	});

$(document).keyup(function(e) {
     if (e.keyCode == 27) { 
        hideCambiarTienda2()
    }
});

function iniciarLazyLoad() {
	if( window.location.pathname != '/marcas' ) {
		if ("IntersectionObserver" in window) {
		  var loader = new IntersectionObserverLoader();
		  loader.lazyload("img.lazyImg");
		  return;
		}
	}

	fallbackLazyLoad();
}

 function fallbackLazyLoad() {
 		if(document.getElementById("nuevoLazyLoad")){
 		$("img.lazyImg").lazyload();
	     $("#departmentsMenu2 li a, #departmentsMenu2 li").hover(function() {
	       $("html,body").trigger("scroll");
	     });
			return; 
		}
	   var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
	   var script = document.createElement("script");
	   script.src = "//cdn3.coppel.com/wcsstore/AuroraStorefrontAssetStore/javascript/jquery.lazyload-b119.js";
	   script.id = "nuevoLazyLoad";
	   head.appendChild(script);
	   script.onload = function() {
	     // Optimizar la forma de cargar imagenes en el sitio
	     $("img.lazyImg").lazyload();
	     $("#departmentsMenu2 li a, #departmentsMenu2 li").hover(function() {
	       $("html,body").trigger("scroll");
	     });
	   };
 }

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  	iniciarLazyLoad();
});


function showCambiarTienda2(){
	$("#cmbTienda").css({'min-height' : '125px', 'opacity' : '1', 'padding' : '25px 0', 'display' : 'block'});
	$('.texto-tienda').show();
	$('.contenido-tienda').show();
	document.getElementById("quickLinks").className="selected";	
	
	$(window).scrollTop(0);
	$('.overlay-cd-entrega').removeClass('hidden');
	$('html').css('overflow', 'hidden');
}

function hideCambiarTienda2(){
	$("#cmbTienda").css({'min-height' : '0', 'opacity' : '0', 'padding' : '0', 'display' : 'none'});
	$('.texto-tienda').hide();
	$('.contenido-tienda').hide();
	document.getElementById("quickLinks").className=document.getElementById("quickLinksBar").className.replace(/\bselected\b/,"");
	$('.overlay-cd-entrega').addClass('hidden');
	$('html').css('overflow', 'auto');
}

dojo.addOnLoad(function() {
	setAjaxRefresh("true"); //Default  is empty-false.
	if(wc.render.getRefreshControllerById("departmentSubMenu_Controller")){
		wc.render.getRefreshControllerById("departmentSubMenu_Controller").url = getAbsoluteURL()+"DepartmentDropdownViewRWD?storeId=12761&catalogId=10001&langId=-5";
	} 	
});

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	dojo.addOnLoad(function() { 
		shoppingActionsJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001','G','$');
		shoppingActionsServicesDeclarationJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001');
	});
	//Declare refresh controller which are used in pagination controls of SearchBasedNavigationDisplay -- both products and articles+videos	
	wc.render.declareRefreshController({
		id: "prodRecommendationRefresh_controller_HeaderBanner_Content_Left",
		renderContext: wc.render.getContextById("searchBasedNavigation_context"),
		url: "",
		formId: ""
	
		,renderContextChangedHandler: function(message, widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			var resultType = renderContext.properties["resultType"];
			if(resultType == "products" || resultType == "both"){
				widget.refresh(renderContext.properties);
				console.log("espot refreshing");
			}
		}
			
		/**
		 * Clears the progress bar after a successful refresh.
		 *
		 * @param {Object} widget The refresh area widget.
		 */
		,postRefreshHandler: function(widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			cursor_clear();
			
			var refreshUrl = controller.url;
			var emsName = "";
			var indexOfEMSName = refreshUrl.indexOf("emsName=", 0);
			if(indexOfEMSName >= 0){
				emsName = refreshUrl.substring(indexOfEMSName+8);
				if (emsName.indexOf("&") >= 0) {
					emsName = emsName.substring(0, emsName.indexOf("&"));
					emsName = "script_" + emsName;
				}
			}
				
			if (emsName != "") {
				if (dojo.byId(emsName) != null) {
					var espot = dojo.query('.genericESpot',dojo.byId(emsName).parentNode)[0];
					if (espot != null) {
						dojo.addClass(espot,'emptyESpot');
					}
				}
			}
			dojo.publish("CMPageRefreshEvent");
		}
	});
</script>

<!-- END CatalogEntryRecommendation.jsp --></div>
		<div class="col6 acol12" data-slot-id="3">
	<span class="nodisplay">Espot</span>
	
	<!-- BEGIN ContentRecommendation.jsp --><!-- END ContentRecommendation.jsp -->

	<!-- BEGIN CategoryRecommendation.jsp --><!-- END CategoryRecommendation.jsp -->
	<span class="nodisplay">Espot</span>
	
	<!-- BEGIN CatalogEntryRecommendation.jsp -->

															<div class="sliderFacetContainer">
																<span class="irs irs--flat js-irs-0  irs-with-grid"><span class="irs"><span class="irs-line" tabindex="0"></span><span class="irs-min">$2 000</span><span class="irs-max">$80 000</span><span class="irs-from">0</span><span class="irs-to">0</span><span class="irs-single">0</span></span><span class="irs-grid"><span class="irs-grid-pol" style="left: 0%"></span><span class="irs-grid-text js-grid-text-0" style="left: 0%">2 000</span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 15%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 10%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 5%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol" style="left: 20%"></span><span class="irs-grid-text js-grid-text-1" style="left: 20%; visibility: hidden;">17 600</span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 35%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 30%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 25%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol" style="left: 40%"></span><span class="irs-grid-text js-grid-text-2" style="left: 40%; visibility: hidden;">33 200</span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 55%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 50%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 45%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol" style="left: 60%"></span><span class="irs-grid-text js-grid-text-3" style="left: 60%; visibility: hidden;">48 800</span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 75%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 70%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 65%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol" style="left: 80%"></span><span class="irs-grid-text js-grid-text-4" style="left: 80%">64 400</span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 95%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 90%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol small" style="left: 85%"></span><span class="irs-grid-pol" style="left: 100%"></span><span class="irs-grid-text js-grid-text-5" style="left: 100%; visibility: hidden;">80 000</span></span><span class="irs-bar"></span><span class="irs-shadow shadow-from"></span><span class="irs-shadow shadow-to"></span><span class="irs-handle from"><i></i><i></i><i></i></span><span class="irs-handle to"><i></i><i></i><i></i></span></span><div id="slider-price" class="slider-facet irs-hidden-input" tabindex="-1"></div>
															</div>
															<script type="text/javascript">
																(function(){
																	var pairs = location.hash.substring(1).split(SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.contextValueSeparator);
																	var minPrice = 2000;
																	var maxPrice = 80000;
																	var found=false;
																	for(var k = 0; k < pairs.length; k++) {
																		var pair = pairs[k].split(":");
																		if(pair[0] == "minPrice") {
																			if( pair[1] != '') minPrice = pair[1];
																			found=true;
																		}
																		else if(pair[0] == "maxPrice") {
																			if( pair[1] != '') maxPrice = pair[1];
																			found=true;
																		}
																	}
																  	$("#slider-price").ionRangeSlider({
																        type: "double",
																        grid: true,
																        grid_num: 5,
																        force_edges:true,
																        skin:'flat',
																        min: 2000,
																        max: 80000,
																        from: minPrice,
																        to: maxPrice,
																        step:(80000-2000)<=1000?10:100,
																        prefix: "$",
																        onFinish: function (data) {
																            if(data.from==data.min && data.to==data.max ){
																            	dojo.topic.publish('Facet_Remove');
																            }else{
																	            $( "#low_price_input" ).val( data.from );
																		        $( "#high_price_input" ).val(data.to );
																		        $( "#low_price_value" ).val( data.from );
																		        $( "#high_price_value" ).val( data.to );
																	       		dojo.topic.publish('Facet_Add');
																	       	}
																	       	if( typeof CustomTagManager == "object" ){
																	       		// ADD FLAG TO PRICE FACET
																	       		CustomTagManager.facetPriceChanged = true;
																	       	}
																        },
																    });
																    if(found){
																    	SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.toggleExpand("0_5_-1004_1106");
																    }
															    })();
															  </script>
														
													</div>
												</div>
											</div>
											</fieldset>
										
									    			<fieldset id="Definición">
									    		
											
											<script>
												SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.uniqueParentArray['Definición'] = 0;
												SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.widgetId = '_5_-1004_1106';
											</script>
											<legend class="spanacce" aria-hidden="true">Definición</legend>

															</div>
															<script type="text/javascript">
																(function(){
																	$('#section_ads_f19123_ntk_cs_5_-1004_1106 ul').hide();
																	
																	
																	var values=[
																		
																				55
																			,
																				32
																			,
																				43
																			,
																				65
																			,
																				49
																			,
																				40
																			,
																				70
																			,
																				24
																			,
																				50
																			,
																				58
																			,
																				75
																			,
																				86
																			,
																				20
																			,
																				22
																			,
																				28
																			,
																				60
																			];
																	
																	var facets={
																		
																					55:'-7000000000000237007535334'
																			,
																					32:'-7000000000000237007515034'
																			,
																					43:'-7000000000000237007525134'
																			,
																					65:'-7000000000000237007545334'
																			,
																					49:'-7000000000000237007525734'
																			,
																					40:'-7000000000000237007524834'
																			,
																					70:'-7000000000000237007554834'
																			,
																					24:'-7000000000000237007505234'
																			,
																					50:'-7000000000000237007534834'
																			,
																					58:'-7000000000000237007535634'
																			,
																					75:'-7000000000000237007555334'
																			,
																					86:'-7000000000000237007565434'
																			,
																					20:'-7000000000000237007504834'
																			,
																					22:'-7000000000000237007505034'
																			,
																					28:'-7000000000000237007505634'
																			,
																					60:'-7000000000000237007544834'
																				
																	};
																	values=values.sort(function(a,b){return a-b});
																	var min=values[values.length-1];
																	var max=values[0];
																	var pairs = location.hash.substring(1).split(SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.contextValueSeparator);
																	var found=false;
																	for(var k = 0; k < pairs.length; k++) {
																		var pair = pairs[k].split(":");
																		if(pair[0] == "facet") {
																			var ids = pair[1].split(",");
																			for(var i = 0; i < ids.length; i++) {
																				for( var j in facets){
																					if(facets[j]== ids[i]){
																						j=parseFloat(j);
																						found=true;
																						if(j<min) min=j;
																						if(j>max) max=j;
																					}
																				}
																			}
																		}
																	}
																	if(found){
																		min=values.indexOf(parseFloat(min));
																		max=values.indexOf(parseFloat(max));
																	}else{
																		min=0;
																		max=values.length-1;
																	}
																	$("#slider_ads_f19123_ntk_cs_5_-1004_1106").ionRangeSlider({
																	        type: "double",
																	        grid: true,
																	        skin:'flat',
																	        force_edges:true,
																	        from:min,
																	        to:max,
																	        values:values,
																	        onFinish: function (data) {
																	            if(typeof this.fromAnterior === 'undefined' &&  found){
																	            	this.fromAnterior = min;
																	            	this.toAnterior = max;
																	            }
																	            
																	            
																	            if(!(typeof this.fromAnterior === 'undefined' || this.fromAnterior==null)){
																		            for ( var i = this.fromAnterior; i <= this.toAnterior; i++){
																		            	$('#'+facets[values[i]]).prop( "onclick", null ).prop('checked', false);
																		            	SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.removeFilterFacet(facets[values[i]],true);
																		            }
																		        }
																	            if(!(data.from==data.min && data.to==data.max) ){
																		            for (var i = data.from; i <= data.to; i++){
																		           		$('#'+facets[values[i]]).prop( "onclick", null ).prop('checked', true);
																		           		SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.appendFilterFacet(facets[values[i]],true);
																		           		
																		            }
																		            this.fromAnterior=data.from;
																	            	this.toAnterior=data.to;
																		        }else{
																		        	this.fromAnterior=null;
																	            	this.toAnterior=null;
																		        }
																	            
																	            SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.doSearchFilter();
																	            
																		       //dojo.topic.publish('Facet_Add');
																	        },
																	        onUpdate:function(data){
																	        	this.fromAnterior=null;
																	            this.toAnterior=null;
																	        }
																	    });
																	    
																	    if(found){
																	    	SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.toggleExpand("ads_f19123_ntk_cs_5_-1004_1106");
																	    }
																})();
															</script>
														
													</div>
												</div>
											</div>
											</fieldset>

<script type="text/javascript">
	require(["dojo/on"], function(on) {
		on(document, "a.facetbutton:click", function(event) {
			var checkbox = document.getElementById(this.getAttribute("data-for"));
			checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked;
			if (this.getAttribute("role") == "checkbox") {
				this.setAttribute("aria-checked", checkbox.checked);
			}
			checkbox.onclick();
			event.preventDefault();
	   });
	});
	var _searchBasedNavigationFacetContext = new Array();

	

	require(["dojo/domReady!"], function(){
		setTimeout("SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.restoreHistoryContext();", 200);
	});


	window.onpopstate = function(event) {
		setTimeout("SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.restoreHistoryContext();", 200);
	};
</script>
<style>
	.hidden{ display: none; }
</style>
<script>
	/* Validar que excluya argentina */
	if( imageDirectoryPath.split('/').indexOf('CoppelARStorefrontAssetStore') == -1 ){

		function mostrarFiltroMovil(){
			$('html').css('overflow-y', 'hidden');
			$('.dijit.orderBySelect').addClass('hidden');
		}
		
		$('.cerrarFiltro').on('click', function(){
			$('html').css('overflow-y', 'auto');
			$('.dijit.orderBySelect').removeClass('hidden');
		});
		
		$('.facetbutton').on('click',function(){
			$('.overlay-filtrado').removeClass('hidden');
			
			setTimeout(function(){
				$('.overlay-filtrado').addClass('hidden');
			},400);
		});
		
		$(document).ready(function(){
			$('.facetWidget.collapsible .content').css({'display' : 'block', 'position' : 'fixed'});
			$('.overlayProductos').addClass('hidden');
			
			$(window).scroll(function () {
				var posicion = $(window).scrollTop();
				var ancho    = $(window).width();
				
				if( ancho < 800 ){
					if(posicion < 315){
						$('.facetContainer').removeClass('anclado');
						$('.orderByDropdown').removeClass('anclado');
					}
					
					if(posicion > 315){
						$('.facetContainer').addClass('anclado');
						$('.orderByDropdown').addClass('anclado');
					}			
				}
			
			});
		});
	}else{
		$('.overlayProductos').addClass('hidden');
		$('.botones-filtros').addClass('hidden');
	}
</script>
<!-- END FacetNavigation_VerticalView_UI.jsp --><!-- END FacetNavigation.jsp --></div>
		</div>
		<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-9 catalogo-list" data-slot-id="6">

<script type="text/javascript">
	dojo.addOnLoad(function() { 
		shoppingActionsJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001','G','$');
		shoppingActionsServicesDeclarationJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001');
	});
	//Declare refresh controller which are used in pagination controls of SearchBasedNavigationDisplay -- both products and articles+videos	
	wc.render.declareRefreshController({
		id: "prodRecommendationRefresh_controller_03-1616Row4_CatEntries",
		renderContext: wc.render.getContextById("searchBasedNavigation_context"),
		url: "",
		formId: ""
	
		,renderContextChangedHandler: function(message, widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			var resultType = renderContext.properties["resultType"];
			if(resultType == "products" || resultType == "both"){
				widget.refresh(renderContext.properties);
				console.log("espot refreshing");
			}
		}
			
		/**
		 * Clears the progress bar after a successful refresh.
		 *
		 * @param {Object} widget The refresh area widget.
		 */
		,postRefreshHandler: function(widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			cursor_clear();
			
			var refreshUrl = controller.url;
			var emsName = "";
			var indexOfEMSName = refreshUrl.indexOf("emsName=", 0);
			if(indexOfEMSName >= 0){
				emsName = refreshUrl.substring(indexOfEMSName+8);
				if (emsName.indexOf("&") >= 0) {
					emsName = emsName.substring(0, emsName.indexOf("&"));
					emsName = "script_" + emsName;
				}
			}
				
			if (emsName != "") {
				if (dojo.byId(emsName) != null) {
					var espot = dojo.query('.genericESpot',dojo.byId(emsName).parentNode)[0];
					if (espot != null) {
						dojo.addClass(espot,'emptyESpot');
					}
				}
			}
			dojo.publish("CMPageRefreshEvent");
		}
	});
</script>

<!-- END CatalogEntryRecommendation.jsp --><!-- BEGIN CatalogEntryList.jsp -->

wc.render.declareRefreshController(searchBasedNavigation_controller_initProperties);
</script>

		<script>
			dojo.addOnLoad(function(){
				dojo.topic.subscribe("Facet_Add", function(){
					if (arguments.length > 0) {
						SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.appendFilterFacet(arguments[0]);
					} else {
						SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.appendFilterPriceRange();
					}
					SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.doSearchFilter();
				});
				dojo.topic.subscribe("Facet_Remove", function(){
				if (arguments.length > 0) {
						SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.removeFilterFacet(arguments[0]);
						SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.doSearchFilter();											
					} else {
						SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.removeFilterPriceRange();
					}
				});
				dojo.topic.subscribe("Facet_RemoveAll", function(){
					SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.clearAllFacets(true);
				});
			});
		</script>

		<script type="text/javascript">
			//Use the following product impression tracking code on pages where your products are listed like product listing page
			var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_518282"]');
			if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
			var priceId = priceObj.id;
			var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
			price = price.replace('$','');
			ga('ec:addImpression',{						// ImpressionFieldObject stores product impression data
				'id': 'PM-2669953', 					// Product ID/SKU - Type: string
				'name': 'Pantalla LED Hisense 50 Ultra HD 4K Smart TV 50H6D', 	// Product name - Type: string
				'category': '13151',			// Product category. Use / as a delimiter to specify up to 5 levels of hierarchy (e.g Men/Shirts/T-Shirts) - Type: string
				'price': price.trim(), 		// Product price - Type: numeric
				'list': getMenuTitles()         			// Product list (string).
			});
			}
			//ga('send', 'event', 'Product Details Page', 'View', 'Pantalla LED Hisense 50" Ultra HD 4K Smart TV 50H6D');
		</script>
	


<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>                
                
<!-- END AnalyticsProducts.jspf -->

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

		<script type="text/javascript">
			//Use the following product impression tracking code on pages where your products are listed like product listing page
			var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_732168"]');
			if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
			var priceId = priceObj.id;
			var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
			price = price.replace('$','');
			ga('ec:addImpression',{						// ImpressionFieldObject stores product impression data
				'id': 'PM-2027353', 					// Product ID/SKU - Type: string
				'name': 'Pantalla LED LG de 55 4K UHD Smart TV 55UK6250PUB', 	// Product name - Type: string
				'category': '13151',			// Product category. Use / as a delimiter to specify up to 5 levels of hierarchy (e.g Men/Shirts/T-Shirts) - Type: string
				'price': price.trim(), 		// Product price - Type: numeric
				'list': getMenuTitles()         			// Product list (string).
			});
			}
			//ga('send', 'event', 'Product Details Page', 'View', 'Pantalla LED LG de 55" 4K UHD Smart TV 55UK6250PUB');
		</script>
	


<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>                
                
<!-- END AnalyticsProducts.jspf -->

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

		<script type="text/javascript">
			//Use the following product impression tracking code on pages where your products are listed like product listing page
			var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_626033"]');
			if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
			var priceId = priceObj.id;
			var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
			price = price.replace('$','');
			ga('ec:addImpression',{						// ImpressionFieldObject stores product impression data
				'id': 'PM-2867913', 					// Product ID/SKU - Type: string
				'name': 'Pantalla LED Hisense 40 Full HD Smart TV 40H5D/E', 	// Product name - Type: string
				'category': '13151',			// Product category. Use / as a delimiter to specify up to 5 levels of hierarchy (e.g Men/Shirts/T-Shirts) - Type: string
				'price': price.trim(), 		// Product price - Type: numeric
				'list': getMenuTitles()         			// Product list (string).
			});
			}
			//ga('send', 'event', 'Product Details Page', 'View', 'Pantalla LED Hisense 40" Full HD Smart TV 40H5D/E');
		</script>
	


<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>                
                
<!-- END AnalyticsProducts.jspf -->

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

		<script type="text/javascript">
			//Use the following product impression tracking code on pages where your products are listed like product listing page
			var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_731577"]');
			if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
			var priceId = priceObj.id;
			var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
			price = price.replace('$','');
			ga('ec:addImpression',{						// ImpressionFieldObject stores product impression data
				'id': 'PM-2027433', 					// Product ID/SKU - Type: string
				'name': 'Pantalla LED LG 43 UHD 4K Smart TV 43UK6250PUB', 	// Product name - Type: string
				'category': '13151',			// Product category. Use / as a delimiter to specify up to 5 levels of hierarchy (e.g Men/Shirts/T-Shirts) - Type: string
				'price': price.trim(), 		// Product price - Type: numeric
				'list': getMenuTitles()         			// Product list (string).
			});
			}
			//ga('send', 'event', 'Product Details Page', 'View', 'Pantalla LED LG 43" UHD 4K Smart TV 43UK6250PUB');
		</script>
	


<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>                
                
<!-- END AnalyticsProducts.jspf -->

		<script type="text/javascript">
			//Use the following product impression tracking code on pages where your products are listed like product listing page
			var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_712506"]');
			if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
			var priceId = priceObj.id;
			var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
			price = price.replace('$','');
			ga('ec:addImpression',{						// ImpressionFieldObject stores product impression data
				'id': 'PM-2986583', 					// Product ID/SKU - Type: string
				'name': 'Pantalla LED Samsung 43 Full HD Smart TV UN43J5290AFXZX', 	// Product name - Type: string
				'category': '13151',			// Product category. Use / as a delimiter to specify up to 5 levels of hierarchy (e.g Men/Shirts/T-Shirts) - Type: string
				'price': price.trim(), 		// Product price - Type: numeric
				'list': getMenuTitles()         			// Product list (string).
			});
			}
			//ga('send', 'event', 'Product Details Page', 'View', 'Pantalla LED Samsung 43" Full HD Smart TV UN43J5290AFXZX');
		</script>
	


<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

				'name': 'Pantalla LED Hisense 55 Ultra HD 4K Smart TV 55H6E', 	// Product name - Type: string
				'category': '13151',			// Product category. Use / as a delimiter to specify up to 5 levels of hierarchy (e.g Men/Shirts/T-Shirts) - Type: string
				'price': price.trim(), 		// Product price - Type: numeric
				'list': getMenuTitles()         			// Product list (string).

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<div class="enlace-listado" onclick="window.location='https://www.coppel.com/electronica/television-y-video/pantallas-led/pantalla-led-samsung-de-49-pulgadas-full-hd-smart-tv-un49j5290afxzx-pm-2998593'">

		<script type="text/javascript">
			//Use the following product impression tracking code on pages where your products are listed like product listing page
			var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_717066"]');
			if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
			var priceId = priceObj.id;
			var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
			price = price.replace('$','');
			ga('ec:addImpression',{						// ImpressionFieldObject stores product impression data
				'id': 'PM-2998593', 					// Product ID/SKU - Type: string
				'name': 'Pantalla LED Samsung de 49 Full HD Smart TV UN49J5290AFXZX', 	// Product name - Type: string
				'category': '13151',			// Product category. Use / as a delimiter to specify up to 5 levels of hierarchy (e.g Men/Shirts/T-Shirts) - Type: string
				'price': price.trim(), 		// Product price - Type: numeric
				'list': getMenuTitles()         			// Product list (string).
			});
			}
			//ga('send', 'event', 'Product Details Page', 'View', 'Pantalla LED Samsung de 49" Full HD Smart TV UN49J5290AFXZX');
		</script>
	


<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

							<tbody>
							</tbody>
						</table>
					</div>		
				</div>						
									
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
